contentrichtext.text: '''New Democratic Party''' may refer to: * [[New Democratic Party (Albania)]], a moderately successful nationalist third party in Albania * [[New Democratic Party of Canada]], a social democratic organization in Canada which includes ** [[New Democratic Party (Canada)]] the federal political party that, as of 2013, holds the second most seats in Canada's federal parliament ** [[Alberta New Democratic Party]] ** [[British Columbia New Democratic Party]] ** [[New Democratic Party of Manitoba]] ** [[New Brunswick New Democratic Party]] ** [[Newfoundland and Labrador New Democratic Party]] ** [[Nova Scotia New Democratic Party]] ** [[Ontario New Democratic Party]] ** [[New Democratic Party of Prince Edward Island]] ** [[New Democratic Party of Quebec]], from 1963 to 1994 ** [[Saskatchewan New Democratic Party]] ** [[Yukon New Democratic Party]] * [[New Democratic Party (New Zealand)]], a former minor party in New Zealand split from the Social Credit Party * [[New Democratic Party (Saint Vincent)]], a major and formerly dominant right-wing party in St. Vincent and the Grenadines * [[New Democratic Party (Sri Lanka)]] * [[United New Democratic Party]], a major centre-left political party in the Republic of Korea *[[China New Democracy Party]] a political party that started in the People's Republic of China, and banned by the Communist Party of China. == See also == *[[Democratic Party (disambiguation)]] *[[New Democracy (disambiguation)]] * [[New Democrats]], a faction in the United States Democratic Party {{disambig}} [[Category:Political party disambiguation pages]]
